mapper.select: SELECT ID, NAME, EMAIL FROM GOOGLE WHERE DEL_YN = 'N'
SELECT AUTH_ID, AUTH_NAME FROM AUTH WHERE DEL_YN = 'N'

SELECT GOOGLE.NAME, GOOGLE.ID, AUTH.AUTH_NAME, AUTH.AUTH_ID, TO_CHAR(AUTH_MAPPING.MOD_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh:mi:ss') as MOD_DATE FROM AUTH_MAPPING INNER JOIN GOOGLE ON (AUTH_MAPPING.USER_ID = GOOGLE.ID AND GOOGLE.DEL_YN = 'N') INNER JOIN AUTH ON (AUTH_MAPPING.AUTH_ID = AUTH.AUTH_ID AND AUTH.DEL_YN = 'N') WHERE AUTH_MAPPING.USER_ID = #{userId} AND AUTH_MAPPING.DEL_YN = 'N'
